alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Nye County; Northwestern Nye County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; Southwest Elko County; White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 4:58PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...An area of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Lander, Nye, White Pine, southeastern Elko and Eureka Counties through 600 PM PDT... At 454 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking an area of strong thunderstorms moving southwest to northeast, across Northern Nye, Southern Lander, Southern Eureka, and White Pine Counties. These storms are capable of producing brief heavy rain, strong winds and small hail. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ely, Eureka, Hickison Summit, Austin, Great Basin National Park, Round Mountain, Lages Junction, Ely Airport, Pinto Summit, Grass Valley, Duckwater, Ruth, Manhattan, Lund, Garden Pass, McGill, Schellbourne, Preston, Eureka Airport and Cherry Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Nye County; Northwestern Nye County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; Southwest Elko County; White Pine County
